_comment: OSA Event Triggers — Copy to ~/.osa/TRIGGERS.json to activate

triggers.name: New Lead Handler
triggers.job: A new lead just came in: {{payload}}. Research the company, score the lead, and draft a personalized first response.

triggers.name: Error Alert Analyzer
triggers.job: An error alert was triggered: {{payload}}. Analyze the error, check recent changes, and suggest a fix.

triggers.name: New Support Ticket
triggers.job: New support ticket received: {{payload}}. Classify priority (P0-P3), check knowledge base for similar issues, draft initial response.

triggers.name: Meeting Prep Trigger
triggers.job: Meeting starting in 15 minutes: {{payload.title}} with {{payload.attendees}}. Prepare a quick briefing with attendee context and talking points.

triggers.name: Auto Code Review
triggers.job: New commits pushed to {{payload.repository}}: {{payload.commits}}. Do a quick review of the changes — flag any security issues or obvious bugs.
